amendment.description: To amend title 18, United States Code, to exempt qualified current and former law enforcement officers from State laws prohibiting the carrying of concealed handguns.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2623 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 91 - 8. Record Vote Number: 26.

action.text: Amendment SA 2623 proposed by Senator Hatch for Senator Campbell. (consideration: CR S1623-1634; text: CR S1623-1624) To amend title 18, United States Code, to exempt qualified current and former law enforcement officers from State laws prohibiting the carrying of concealed handguns.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2623 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 91 - 8. Record Vote Number: 26.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 2623 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 91 - 8. Record Vote Number: 26.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2623 proposed by Senator Hatch for Senator Campbell.
